price: (54) [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā furushin baṭāinuhā min is'tabraqin wajanā al-janatayni dānin
